channel.title: Notes on Encompass Docs
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on Encompass Docs

item.title: API Reference
item.description: A more formal API Reference can be found on ReadTheDocs.

item.title: Acknowledgments
item.description: Special thanks is due to Mark Kollasch for his insight into the n-pass engine structure and for overall excellent architecture feedback. Many of the ideas in this project were given to me by him. Thanks to Seiji Tanaka for writing a state machine system with me many years ago and sending me on a long journey of thinking about game architecture. Thanks to Mitch Gerrard for doing a bunch of graph theory problems with me.

item.title: License
item.description: This project is licensed under the Cooperative Software License. You should have received a copy of this license with the framework code. If not, the full text of the License is provided here. The long and short of it is that if you are working for commercial purposes on behalf of a corporation and not for yourself as a hobbyist individual or a worker-owned cooperative, you are not welcome to use this software as-is.
